title: Seaside Resort Deluxe Room
description: Facing the beachfront, Seagull Hotel Ltd offers 5-star accommodation in Coxs Bazar and has an outdoor swimming pool, garden and shared lounge. The property features a bar, as well as a private beach area. The hotel features sea views, a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath.A buffet, continental or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At Seagull Hotel Ltd you will find a restaurant serving American, Chinese and Indian cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested.At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub.The nearest airport is Cox's Bazar Airport, 2 km from Seagull Hotel Ltd.Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.5 for a two-person trip.
